dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset comprising approximately 10 million lines of lyrics paired with synthetic visual elaborations generated by a large language model, aimed at facilitating the visualization of figurative language.
dcterms:title: LyricCanvas

dcterms:creator: Tuhin Chakrabarty
Arkadiy Saakyan
Olivia Winn
Artemis Panagopoulou
Yue Yang
Marianna Apidianaki
Smaranda Muresan
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1,540 linguistic metaphors and their corresponding visual elaborations, reviewed by experts, used to evaluate the robustness of models in generating visual representations of metaphors.
dcterms:title: HAIVMet

dcterms:creator: Elvis Saravia
Hsien-Chi Toby Liu
Yen-Hao Huang
Junlin Wu
Yi-Shin Chen
dcterms:description: A classification dataset consisting of 20,000 samples from Twitter messages labeled with six basic emotions, used for emotion recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: Emotion dataset

dcterms:creator: Emmy Liu
Chenxuan Cui
Kenneth Zheng
Graham Neubig
dcterms:description: A dataset designed to test the ability of language models to interpret figurative language, containing approximately 12,000 figurative phrases with correct and incorrect interpretations.
dcterms:title: Fig-QA

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie
James Hays
Pietro Perona
Deva Ramanan

dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset of images containing common objects in context, widely used in computer vision tasks.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:creator: Thierry Bertin-Mahieux
Daniel P.W. Ellis
Brian Whitman
Paul Lamere
dcterms:description: A dataset containing a collection of music tracks and their associated metadata, primarily used for music information retrieval tasks.
dcterms:title: musiXmatch

dcterms:creator: Chen Liu
Gregor Geigle
Robin Krebs
Iryna Gurevych
dcterms:description: A dataset for figurative language identification in politically-opinionated memes, containing 5,000 samples.
dcterms:title: FigMemes
